籤詩版本二:
Usateerera kumashoko asina maturo, pamusoro pezvakanaka nezvakaipa, Mangwanani nemanheru, unogona kungotaura Ami chete.
Kana mazwi emusango ari echokwadi, bhuku rinonzi "How to Stop Hungry" rine shoko rokuti "general", uye iri ndiro shoko rokuti "mubairo".
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inomiririra chiratidzo chemakeke kugutsa nzara.
Zvose hazvina maturo uye zvishoma chaizvo.
解曰: Kana pfungwa dzisina chokwadi, hazvibatsiri kuverenga magwaro. Kungofanana nekeke rakapendwa, chikafu chacho chinonetsa kumedza.
籤詩故事一:
◇Mazwi aCao Cao nezve plums anopedza nyota
Munguva yeHumambo Hutatu, Cao Cao akatungamirira mauto ake.Kwakanga kune kuperevedza kwemvura mumwaka wakaoma uye varwi vakanga vane nyota.Cao Cao akanyepa kuti kune sango repramu mberi, uye aigona kudya plums ikoko kuti apedze nyota yake.
(Dimikira rekuti “kutarira maruva emupuranga kuti upedze nyota” rinobva pano. Rinobvumirana nerokuti “kupenda makeke ekugutsa nzara”.
聖意: Namatira rombo rakanaka mumba mako (zvisingafadzi), rombo rakanaka muhupfumi (usafunge nezvazvo), kutengeserana kwakatsetseka (mira zvishoma), zvipingamupinyi muwanano (pamuviri isina chinhu), vanofamba netsoka, vanonoka silkworms, zviri nani kudyara. Zvipfuyo zvitanhatu zvakakurumidza, zvisingafadzi kuwana vanhu (zvakaoma), kumatare edzimhosva uye (musafare) Kutama kunochengetedza, kurasikirwa nepfuma, chirwere, uye kushuvira rombo rakanaka kumakomo nemakuva.
古人: Cao Cao anotaura nezve plums kupedza nyota yake
